name: Cat vs. Dog
summary: The player controls a dog, and must strategically aim to throw bones at a cat; taking turns, the cat will throw cans back at the dog. It is somewhat similar to Worms or Microsoft's Gorillas. Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a rendition of the Winnie the Pooh theme.
